4001.name: The Forest Road
4001.description:
The cobblestone road from Midgaard gives way to a dirt path as
you enter the ancient Haon Dor forest. Massive oak trees tower 
overhead, their branches forming a green canopy that filters the 
sunlight. The air is thick with the scent of earth and growing things.
Strange sounds echo from deeper within the woods.

4002.name: Deep in the Forest
4002.description:
The forest grows denser here. Ancient trees press close, their
gnarled roots crossing the path. Mushrooms of unusual colors grow
in clusters at their bases. The sounds of civilization have faded,
replaced by bird calls and rustling leaves. Shadows move between
the trees - or is that just your imagination?

4003.name: The Ancient Grove
4003.description:
You've stumbled upon a sacred grove deep within the forest. 
A massive oak, easily a thousand years old, dominates the clearing.
Strange runes are carved into its bark, and offerings of flowers
and berries are piled at its base. This place radiates ancient power.

4010.name: Forest Trail North
4010.description:
The path winds northward through increasingly rocky terrain.
The trees thin out here, and you can see the dark mouth of a cave
in the hillside ahead. Crude totems mark the path - you're entering
goblin territory.

4020.name: Edge of the Swamp
4020.description:
The ground becomes soft and waterlogged. The trees here are
twisted and draped with hanging moss. The smell of decay is strong.
Murky water pools between the tree roots, and insects buzz 
annoyingly around your head. The swamp extends to the south.

4021.name: Deep Swamp
4021.description:
Brackish water rises to your knees here. Rotting logs provide
the only solid footing. Something large moves beneath the murky
surface. Will-o'-wisps dance in the distance, trying to lure
travelers to their doom.

4001.name: a forest wolf
4001.long_desc: A large grey wolf prowls through the undergrowth.

4002.name: a giant spider
4002.long_desc: A spider the size of a dog lurks in its web.

4003.name: a brown bear
4003.long_desc: A massive brown bear forages among the trees.

4004.name: the Forest Druid
4004.long_desc: A druid in green robes tends the sacred grove.

4005.name: a giant frog
4005.long_desc: A frog the size of a pony croaks menacingly.

4006.name: a swamp troll
4006.long_desc: A moss-covered troll rises from the muck, dripping slime.

40.name: the druid's staff
40.room_desc: A staff carved from ancient oak lies here.
